title: Domino’s New Delivery E-Bikes Come With a Built-In Pizza Oven
content:
With pizzas subject to a claimed 10.2 G of forces in a delivery, the only solution is a bike with what looks like a rocket strapped on the back.

Read the full article at Domino’s New Delivery E-Bikes Come With a Built-In Pizza Oven on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
